title: Need a translation please. Japanese?

embed.description: Star Guardians can only defeat the darkness that spreads across the universe if they stand together. They will fight as one or fall as many.

body: Sorry didn't know how to post an image, but at 53 seconds jinx is sitting on a pillar with a foreign character on it? Does anyone know the translation to it? Thanks for the trouble.

replies.body:
Drawing it into google translate gives me: 星 which apparently means "star" which seems appropriate.

(Sorry, I don't know Japanese, nor did I work on the Star Guardian music video, so I'm just trying to work it out, same as you.)
I got Day when i tried.

Nah, day would be 日.
Star seems to be the most likely one.

It's 星 (Hoshi ほし) as others have said, the full writing looking to be 星乃 (Hoshino ほしの), which is an archaic version of the character set 星の (Hoshi no, meaning star's as in possessed by star), I presume the entire pillar would say Star's Guardian.
In Chinese, that character means "star". The same character is used in Japanese to mean the same thing.
It does appear to be similar to Hoshi (星) / Star
Is that not just her Graffiti signature in japanese?  That's what I'd assumed.
